WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM JCT-50ESE CWK-120SSE PSX-80E BRO-BRO-70SSE LRD-JCT 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 3...FROM 50NE PUB-LBL-70WNW MRF-ELP-30W ELP-60ESE RSK-50NE

PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
